title: Life's Rewards
overview: Privileged son of a high-profile wealth manager, Dan had it easy until he waged everything on a big gamble and lost. His clients, friends, and the hotel employees recognize Dan for who he really is: a na√Øve yet ambitious narcissist. Stranded while traveling for work, Dan is forced to live off the only two assets he has left: his unquestionable charisma and a massive cache of hotel points.
